7.2 Physical activity
Regular and adequate levels of physical activity are fundamental to the maintenance of energy balance and 
optimum weight, as well as having significant health benefits [201]. All bodily movements produced by skeletal 
muscles are considered as physical activity, including walking, household work, manual labour and sports. Being
